snippet.title: Falcon Age | PS4, PS VR Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Falcon Age is a first-person single-player action adventure. As Ara, learn to hunt, gather, and fight to reclaim her cultural legacy in the lost art of falcon hunting against a force of automated colonisers. Players will explore a strange land while bonding with their falcon and helping the resistance.
